item.title: Mega Nirman & Industries Ltd Hits New 52-Week High at Rs.48.29
item.description: Mega Nirman & Industries Ltd has reached a significant milestone by hitting a new 52-week high of Rs.48.29, marking a robust rally that has seen the stock surge over 45% in the past ten trading sessions. Time: 15 minutes ago

item.description: Unipro Technologies Ltd has reached a significant milestone by hitting a new 52-week high of Rs.9.76 today, marking a notable phase of upward momentum after a sustained period of gains. Time: 15 minutes ago

item.description: Phoenix Mills Ltd., a key player in the realty sector, reached a significant milestone today by hitting a new 52-week high of Rs.1871. This achievement underscores the stock’s sustained momentum amid a broadly positive market environment. Time: 15 minutes ago

item.title: Aptech Ltd Stock Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs.90.72
item.description: Aptech Ltd’s shares declined to a fresh 52-week low of Rs.90.72 today, marking a significant milestone in the stock’s ongoing downward trajectory. This new low comes amid persistent underperformance relative to the broader market and sector peers, reflecting a challenging period for the company within the Other Consumer Services industry. Time: 16 minutes ago

item.description: Steel Strips Wheels Ltd recorded a robust intraday performance on 1 Jan 2026, surging 9.36% to touch a day’s high of Rs 208, significantly outperforming its sector and the broader market indices. Time: 24 minutes ago

item.title: S. V. J. Enterprises Ltd Hits New 52-Week High of Rs 546

item.title: Kaizen Agro Infrabuild Ltd Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs.12
item.description: Kaizen Agro Infrabuild Ltd’s stock declined sharply to a new 52-week low of Rs.12 today, marking a significant drop amid broader market gains and sectoral underperformance. The stock’s fall contrasts with the positive momentum seen in the Sensex, which is trading near its 52-week high. Time: 45 minutes ago

item.title: Hindalco Industries Ltd Hits New 52-Week High at Rs.893
item.description: Hindalco Industries Ltd has reached a significant milestone by hitting a new 52-week and all-time high of Rs.893 today, marking a continuation of its strong upward momentum in the non-ferrous metals sector. Time: 45 minutes ago

item.description: Vibrant Global Capital Ltd, a Non Banking Financial Company (NBFC), recorded a fresh 52-week low of Rs.32.8 today, marking a significant decline amid sustained downward momentum. item.title: Garware Synthetics Ltd Stock Hits 52-Week Low Amid Continued Downtrend
item.description: Garware Synthetics Ltd, a player in the Trading & Distributors sector, recorded a fresh 52-week low of Rs.12.1 today, marking a significant decline amid a sustained downtrend that has seen the stock lose over 37% in the past 12 trading sessions. Time: 46 minutes ago

item.title: Digjam Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit on Strong Buying Momentum
item.description: Shares of Digjam Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Garments & Apparels sector, surged to hit the upper circuit limit on 1 Jan 2026, reflecting robust buying interest and a significant intraday gain of 4.98%. This marks the third consecutive day of gains, underscoring renewed investor confidence despite the stock’s recent downgrade to a Sell rating by MarketsMOJO. Time: 56 minutes ago

item.title: KPI Green Energy Ltd Sees High Value Trading Amid Institutional Pressure
item.description: KPI Green Energy Ltd (KPIGREEN), a prominent player in the power sector, witnessed significant trading activity on 1 Jan 2026, registering one of the highest value turnovers in the market. Despite a modest decline in share price, the stock attracted substantial institutional participation and large order flows, signalling continued investor interest amid a challenging market environment. Time: 56 minutes ago

item.title: United Polyfab Gujarat Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit on Robust Buying Pressure
item.description: Shares of United Polyfab Gujarat Ltd surged to their upper circuit limit on 1 Jan 2026, closing at ₹26.56, marking a robust 4.98% gain on the day. This sharp rally was driven by intense buying interest, resulting in a regulatory freeze on further transactions and signalling heightened investor enthusiasm despite the company’s current sell rating. Time: 56 minutes ago

item.title: Adani Total Gas Ltd Sees Robust Trading Activity Amid Mixed Market Signals
item.description: Adani Total Gas Ltd (ATGL), a prominent player in the gas sector, witnessed significant trading activity on 1 January 2026, driven by strong value turnover and notable price gains. Despite a recent downgrade in its Mojo Grade from Buy to Sell, the stock outperformed its sector and the broader Sensex, reflecting a complex interplay of market enthusiasm and cautious institutional positioning. Time: 56 minutes ago

item.title: Essen Speciality Films Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Essen Speciality Films Ltd, a micro-cap player in the diversified consumer products sector, witnessed a sharp decline on 1 Jan 2026, hitting its lower circuit limit amid intense selling pressure. The stock closed at ₹180.95, down 4.99% on the day, marking its maximum permissible daily loss and signalling heightened investor anxiety and panic selling. Time: 56 minutes ago

item.title: Fischer Medical Ventures Ltd Hits Upper Circuit Amid Robust Buying Pressure
item.description: Fischer Medical Ventures Ltd, a small-cap player in the Commodity Chemicals sector, surged to hit its upper circuit limit on 1 Jan 2026, propelled by strong buying momentum and heightened investor interest. The stock outperformed its sector and benchmark indices, reflecting renewed optimism despite a recent upgrade to a Hold rating from Sell by MarketsMOJO. Time: 56 minutes ago

item.title: Adani Power Ltd Sees Robust Trading Activity Amid Institutional Interest
item.description: Adani Power Ltd (ADANIPOWER) emerged as one of the most actively traded stocks by value on 1 January 2026, registering a significant intraday rally and an upgrade in its MarketsMOJO Mojo Grade from Sell to Hold. The stock outperformed its sector and benchmark indices, reflecting renewed institutional interest and strong market participation despite a slight dip in delivery volumes. Time: 56 minutes ago

item.title: Adani Power Ltd Sees Exceptional Volume Surge Amid Positive Momentum
item.description: Adani Power Ltd (ADANIPOWER) emerged as one of the most actively traded stocks on 1 Jan 2026, registering a remarkable volume surge that outpaced its sector and benchmark indices. The stock’s robust intraday performance, coupled with significant trading volumes, signals renewed investor interest and potential accumulation in the power sector heavyweight. Time: 56 minutes ago

item.title: Tata Motors Passenger Vehicles Sees Surge in Call Option Activity Ahead of January Expiry
item.description: Tata Motors Passenger Vehicles Ltd (TMPV) has emerged as one of the most actively traded stocks in the call options segment, signalling heightened investor interest despite a cautious outlook reflected in its recent downgrade. The surge in call option contracts, particularly at the ₹370 strike price expiring on 27 Jan 2026, highlights a complex interplay of bullish positioning and underlying market uncertainties. Time: 56 minutes ago
